Summaries are a simplified view of the resource, intended to be used
as context in the application.

This query will never return an authorization error and will instead
anonymize confidential data.

Please be wary that resource pictures have a configurable shape that
should be honored when displayed.

This route must be accessed with a query string of `'?'.md5($instanceLogoBlobUri)`, as it is cached as
an immutable resource. Otherwise, you might get an outdated picture.

We settled on using a md5 hash of the
blob URI, in order to obfuscate the blob URI itself and to have an aesthetically clean URL.

200.description: Whenever all healths checks are successful.

Shows metrics for instance and user.
Retrieve a temporary authorization element that allow to create a token.
get.description:
The element returned depends on the query parameter:
- `Authorization`: a jwt token
- `Deeplink`: a deeplink containing the jwt, which open the appropriate app
- `DeeplinkQR`: a QR code image containing the deeplink to open the appropriate app

get.summary: Create a new user token that allow to interact with Tipee on his behalf.
